data.message: good day facebook, My friend facebook was blocked. she can't open her facebook account . every time she log to it , facebook said that she need to send valid in order to reopen her facebook account and she already did it , she send two valid id through email. Please help my friend to re open her facebook account .

replies.message: Hi Adol. If your friend has already sent valid identification, rest assured that our team will address the issue as soon as possible. Thanks! -Ryan
